DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Black Bear GPS Location Data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: csv file containing GPS location data of black bears in northeast British Columbia. Data have been cleaned as per the methods outlined in the Journal of Animal Ecology paper.
